mapper.insert: INSERT INTO club( club_no , user_id , club_title , club_detail , club_image , current_member , club_max_member , club_category , club_area) VALUES ( seq_club_no.NEXTVAL , #{userId} , #{clubTitle} , #{clubDetail} , #{clubImage} , #{currentMember:NUMERIC} , #{clubMaxMember:NUMERIC} , #{clubCategory} , #{clubArea})
mapper.select: SELECT club_no , user_id , club_title , club_detail , club_image , current_member , club_max_member , club_category , club_area FROM club WHERE club_no = #{club_no}
